about_the_game:
Love Shoot Them 2! but not enjoy oneself to the full？
This DLC is good for you.


DLC include:

The same as basegame
Add nudity for character

content_descriptors.notes: Have nudity.All characters are over the age of 18

name: Shoot Them 2 - 18

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Home Premium or better
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Due E6300 or AMD althon X2 5000+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 7300GT or ATI X1600
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Due Q6600 or AMD Althon X4 635
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX760 or ATI R7 260X
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: Shoot Them! but not enjoy oneself to the full？ This DLC is good for you.
